0: RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST POSSIBLE TERMS THE AMBUSH ON FORMER PANGASINAN REPRESENTATIVE AMADO ESPINO JR. House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00330
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST POSSIBLE TERMS THE AMBUSH ON FORMER PANGASINAN REPRESENTATIVE AMADO ESPINO JR.
